channel.title: [PI]Seperate point shop pricing[PI]
channel.description: Hello Moparscape! I recently added my PKP shop and my Donor shop say I wanted to have a spectral spirit shield in both shops and I wanted it to be 500 in the pkp shop and 150 in the donor shop how would I do that?

item.title: [PI]Seperate point shop pricing[PI]
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

It works!!!$@#%#$@^%$&%^#$@!$#@
ive been looking for help everywhere making tons of posts thank you so much stenen

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Seperate point shop pricing[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Stenen Stenen
item.description:
@Stenen wrote:

case #:
if (c.myShopId == ##) {
return ###;
}else if (c.myShopId == *) {
return **;
}
break;

Explaination

= your item id

##= first shop id

= price

  • = 2nd shop id
    ** = 2nd price.

Just copy this and fill everything in, post any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Seperate point shop pricing[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“bluedevil666, post:3, topic:535513”]I’m not understanding that more could you explain how to do it on Skype?
ooskiller1[/quote][quote=“Stenen, post:2, topic:535513”][code]
case ####: //switch statement, case ID is the item ID.

if (the shop id is the Donor shop) {//if (shopId == 1234) {
return 150; //price is 150
} else if (the shop id is the pkp shop) { // if the shopId is a different ID
return 500; //price is 500
}
Break; //break;[/code]
If you dont understand i will explain it more :)[/quote]That’s how I interpreted his code.

Read full topic
